job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for a Senior Front-End Engineer for our Personalization and Recommendations team.

   The Personalization and Recommendations has the mission to allow our marketplaces to improve the buying experience by understanding our users and surfacing inspirational content. We build search and discovery solutions, we have recommender systems and user modelling products and are currently building a conversational search solution.

   What you'll do

   Your role in the team is to develop the frontend of a completely new product: Conversational Search. The product is meant to help our users find the goods on our websites easier. It leverages technologies like generative AI and Large Language Models (LLMs). Having an all-knowing assistant at your disposal can change the way our users interact with our websites completely.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Front-End Engineer

We are looking for a Senior Front-End Engineer for our Personalization and Recommendations team.

   The Personalization and Recommendations has the mission to allow our marketplaces to improve the buying experience by understanding our users and surfacing inspirational content. We build search and discovery solutions, we have recommender systems and user modelling products and are currently building a conversational search solution.

   What you'll do

   Your role in the team is to develop the frontend of a completely new product: Conversational Search. The product is meant to help our users find the goods on our websites easier. It leverages technologies like generative AI and Large Language Models (LLMs). Having an all-knowing assistant at your disposal can change the way our users interact with our websites completely.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on a Senior Front-End Engineer role, emphasizing the development of user interfaces for a conversational search product that leverages generative AI. However, the core responsibilities and required skills are primarily centered around front-end development, not the core engineering of AI models or complex AI systems. While the product uses AI, the role itself is not an AI engineering role as defined by the coding book. It lacks the depth in data engineering, modeling, or MLOps that would classify it as an ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The primary responsibility is to 'develop the frontend of a completely new product: Conversational Search', which is a core software development task for user-facing applications.
job_tasks.phrase: develop the frontend of a completely new product: Conversational Search

job_tasks.justification: The team's mission is to 'improve the buying experience by understanding our users and surfacing inspirational content', which aligns with understanding business goals and user needs.
job_tasks.phrase: improve the buying experience by understanding our users and surfacing inspirational content

soft_skills.phrase: change the way our users interact with our websites completely
